item.title: The Taliban Say They’re Ready to Release U.S. Prisoners. But Which Ones?
item.description: Top Afghan officials say they want two American detainees released “as soon as possible,” but the Trump administration says a third one should be incl...

item.title: Thousands of Flights Canceled Monday After Snowstorm
item.description: Delays and cancellations persisted, a day after more than 11,000 flights were canceled. Airports in the Northeast U.S. were hit the hardest.

item.title: Israel Says It Will Reopen Gaza-Egypt Border Crossing in Days
item.description: The Rafah crossing will open at the end of Israel’s search for the remains of the last captive in Gaza.

item.title: Gunmen Kill 11 After Soccer Match in Mexico
item.description: The mass shooting occurred in an area fought over by drug cartels, just as the Mexican government has sought to show Washington that it is combating c...

item.title: Hamas Hands Over Body of Ran Gvili, Closing Chapter for Israel
item.description: The recovery of Master Sgt. Ran Gvili’s body paves the way for the next stage of the Gaza cease-fire plan, though the path forward is unclear.
